thread.title: Takata Air-Bag Problem Widens to Some 2015 GM Vehicles
thread.title_full: Takata Air-Bag Problem Widens to Some 2015 GM Vehicles - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Takata Air-Bag Problem Widens to Some 2015 GM Vehicles
text:
DETROITâ€”The deadly problem with exploding Takata air-bag inflaters continues to spread to newer vehicles, this time hitting a small number of 2015 General Motors cars and SUVs.
GM is recalling more than 400 vehicles because the side air-bag inflaters could rupture and send shrapnel into drivers and passengers, according to the company and documents posted Saturday by the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.
